Reviews.Title: I like it!!
Reviews.Author: Cristian Garcia
Reviews.Content: i buy this phone for my sister, she is very happy whit it, is a cool phone... i prefer the android plataform, but for my sister this is ok..

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Tony "tbux"
Reviews.Content: By far the worst phone ever!Hard to use, slow, and very user UN-friendly!Save your money!  Do not buy this phone!

Reviews.Title: Nice fone but
Reviews.Author: Paul L. Warner
Reviews.Content: No 850 WCDMA (3G), GSM only  so useless in the US unless you can find a WCDMA 2100 cell site..

Reviews.Title: What a lovely phone
Reviews.Author: Lorian Gray "The Goddess Is In"
Reviews.Content: What a lovely phone.  What do you do with it?  Who supports triband phones in US?
